name: Spewpa
description: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.effect: After each turn, this Pokémon has a 33% of being cured of any major status ailment.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.effect: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle.  This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.
